Title: Great deal
Cons: The print cartridges are on clearance everywhere.  Maybe it has been discontinued?
Pros: Great camera and printer.  The print cartridges seem to be on clearance everywhere so you can pick them up pretty cheap.

Title: For the money...
Cons: No usb cable with printer. Starter print cartridge is good for 5 prints.
Pros: This camera takes outstanding pics and I am very impressed with the video quality. Bundled with the printer made it an awesome deal. Printer prints very nice photos and is very compact.
Comments: Overall I am very impressed with the function and quality of pics and prints for the price. NewEgg has always been my choice and once again, Excellent!

Pros: Very easy to use even with not many automatic settings, printer is small and light prints good photos. Overall a very good camera/printer bundle.
Comments: The camera has many manual settings that will take some learning to use to the full potential.

Cons: None so far... dont anticipate any either.
Pros: Great buy and quality for the money. It is a compact little camera that takes great shots!

Title: NewEgg Canon Cam Bundle...
Cons: None. It came...it works...the gift conquered...
Pros: Came as described. Good deal. Nothing to mention outside what is already said in the Spec. It works. No DOA problems of any kind...
Comments: I glad I deal w/ NewEgg...I will continue to do so...

Title: GOOD GOOD GOOD
Pros: GOOD GOOD GOOD. Good one man band bundle. The printer is so nice- i like it almost more than the camera! I don't never have to leave d house- to make 4*6 s that is! The bundled software is not bad like most of the "dollar store" software that comes with most digi-cams.A pleasing bundle of equipment.

Title: good camera
Cons: The battery life is poor but I'm sure high quality rechargables will solve that.
Pros: Camera works very well! the battery life is poor but I'm sure high quality rechargables will solve that.

Title: Great Camera in time for Christmas
Cons: The flash takes a bit to recharge, but it's a great camera to bring around in your pocket.
Pros: Great camera that we bought for my mother.  She took pictures all through the weekend and never had any problems.  She loved the fact that it fit in her pocket.  We have not tried to print anything yet.
